title: The Royal Hello of the Starry Moon
author: Enes & AI Storymaker
coverImageAlt: A simple, modern silhouette of a tiny dragon perched on a crescent moon, looking toward a distant, sparkling moon base.

pages.imageAltText: A wide, peaceful view of the Starry Moon Base, glowing softly against the black velvet of space, with Earth a blue marble in the distance.
pages.text: Far above the world, the Starry Moon Base gleamed like a quiet jewel. It was a peaceful place, but sometimes, very quiet.

pages.imageAltText: Inside the base, Prince Enes, a small boy in a simple silver cape, looks wistfully out a large window at the passing stars.
pages.text: Prince Enes lived there. He had a royal cape and a kind heart, but his secret wish was simple: he just wanted to hear a friendly 'hello'.

pages.imageAltText: In a hidden moon crater, a tiny, emerald-green dragon with friendly eyes practices making small, glittery puffs of light with its breath.
pages.text: Meanwhile, in a secret crater, a tiny dragon was practicing its special power. Its sparkle-breath could fix star-lights and make flowers from moon dust.

pages.imageAltText: The tiny dragon curiously peers into the window of the moon base, seeing Enes inside. They make eye contact.
pages.text: The dragon flew to the base and peeked in a window. It saw the lonely prince and, with a brave smile, whispered, "Hello!"

pages.imageAltText: The tiny dragon uses its sparkle-breath to repair a broken communication dish on the base's roof, sending a ripple of light into space.
pages.text: While Enes was getting a space-suit, the dragon helped. It fixed the broken hello-speaker on the roof, sending a cheerful signal to the universe.

pages.imageAltText: Enes and the tiny dragon sit together on a ledge, sharing moonberries. They are both smiling, looking at friendly alien animal shapes in the stars.
pages.text: Enes and his new friend shared moonberries. Now, the base felt warm and full of hello's. Prince Enes had discovered the best superhero power: friendship.
